metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3592 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Mosquitto before 2.0.16, a memory leak occurs when clients send v5CONNECT packets with a will message that contains invalid property types.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3592` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1.1
libmosquittopp1 - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1.1
mosquitto - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1.1
mosquitto-clients - 2.0.11-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.11-1ubuntu1.1').
